organizational_structure: Privately held; functional structure with dedicated teams for product, marketing, customer service, and operations.
market_position: Mid-sized direct-to-consumer beauty brand specializing in premium skincare solutions for sensitive skin.
vision: To make dermatologically-safe skincare accessible to all.
mission: To empower individuals with sensitive skin by offering high-performance skincare products that are backed by science and safe for all skin types.
goals: Launch mobile app for skin tracking

founding_members.name: Leila Mendez
founding_members.background: Former clinical researcher in dermatology with a passion for holistic skincare.

founding_members.name: Amit Rao
founding_members.background: Tech entrepreneur with expertise in personalization algorithms and ecommerce infrastructure.

history_and_milestones: 2019: Founded and launched first product line
2020: Reached $500K in revenue; launched DTC website
2024: Named one of the Top 20 DTC Brands by BeautyTech Weekly
